product_name: SunCloud Cayenne Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With looks inspired by vintage cat-eye glasses, the women's SunCloud Cayenne Polarized Sunglasses offer head-turning style while protecting your eyes from harmful UV rays and glare. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. 8-base-curve lenses wrap around to help block light; the higher the number, the more curved the lens-SunCloud features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature. The SunCloud Cayenne Polarized Sunglasses have a universal fit that accommodates most faces. Closeout.
short_description: With looks inspired by vintage cat-eye glasses, the women's SunCloud Cayenne Polarized Sunglasses offer head-turning style while protecting your eyes from harmful UV rays and glare.
